name: Pot Smasher (Julia Z.)
description:
Want a game devoted to breaking pots? Look no further than this Legend of Zelda inspired puzzle game! 

You are not here to save Princess Zelda or defeat Ganondorf – you are here to sate your lust for smashing pots. Unfortunately, it will not be easy to do so – the villagers are fed up with your antics because do you know how long it takes to make pots? You are a scourge that cannot be stopped. In order to preserve the pot supply, they have created a labyrinth made up of walls and crates to protect their precious pottery. To reach them, you will have to move aside crates in a specific order, but beware: it can be easy to get stuck and when that happens, you’ll have to start over! You must navigate fifteen levels of unique mazes before the village’s pots are depleted. Go forth and wreak havoc.
